fgeo.x 1.1.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog
  • fgeo

Access data stored in system files.

Source: R/example_path.R
example_path.Rd

example_path() mostly wraps system.file(..., package = "fgeo.x").

example_path(path = NULL)

Arguments

path

Name of file or directory. If NULL, the example files and directories will be listed.

Value

A character string.

See also

Other datasets: datasets, download_data

Examples

example_path()
#>  [1] "csv"           "mixed_files"   "rdata"         "rdata_one"    
#>  [5] "rds"           "taxa.csv"      "tsv"           "vft_4quad.csv"
#>  [9] "view"          "weird"         "xl"           

dir(example_path("rdata"))
#> [1] "tree5.RData" "tree6.RData"

example_path("taxa.csv")
#> [1] "C:/Users/LeporeM/Documents/Dropbox/git/ml/fgeo.x/inst/extdata/taxa.csv"

str(read.csv(example_path("taxa.csv")))
#> 'data.frame':	163 obs. of  21 variables:
